about_the_game:
You wake up in your bedroom, at home, with a mysterious card in hand—a heartfelt invitation to visit your grandmother, who resides in the tallest skyscraper of the bustling city. The world is open before you, but will you set out to see her, or will unexpected events lead you down a completely different path? The choice is yours.

🎨 Fully Hand-Drawn World
Immerse yourself in a meticulously crafted game world featuring over 10,000 unique, hand-drawn and animated artworks.

🗺️ Epic Exploration
Embark on a journey through diverse environments, from charming villages to vast, rural landscapes, each brimming with life and mystery.

🔍 Uncover the Unknown
Dive into engaging questlines, discover hidden collectibles, unravel deep secrets, and challenge your mind with intricate puzzles.

✨ Personalized Adventure
Experience a game focused on personal exploration, filled with countless random encounters and surprises waiting to be found.

🎵 Play the Handpan
Discover the soothing tones of the handpan—a unique musical instrument you can play within the game to create immersive soundscapes. Your music can solve puzzles, lift spirits, and shape the world around you.

Let your curiosity guide you—this game is a celebration of creativity, wonder, and discovery.

name: Sketchy Fables

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I7-8750H 2.2 GHZ 6 cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD onboard Graphics 520
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on an Laptop GTX 1050, plus laptop Intel Graphics 630, I expect it to work on older GPU's as well (GTX970 for example), tests will be updated here before release.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I7-8750H 2.2 GHZ 6 cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD onboard Graphics 630, or up
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on an Laptop GTX 1050 & GTX3070 laptop

short_description: Sketchy Fables is a free-roaming, first-person adventure that draws you into a fully hand-drawn world. With no restrictions and complete freedom to abandon quests or carve your own path, Sketchy Fables lets you shape your journey until its true meaning is revealed.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
